clarity.name: Clarity
clarity.description: Evaluates how clear, coherent, and well-structured the model's response is

criteria.5: Response is exceptionally clear, well-organized, and easy to understand
criteria.4: Response is clear and well-structured with minor areas for improvement
criteria.3: Response is generally clear but may have some organizational issues
criteria.2: Response has clarity issues that impact understanding
criteria.1: Response is difficult to understand or poorly structured
criteria.0: Response is incomprehensible or completely unclear

completeness.name: Completeness
completeness.description: Evaluates how thoroughly the model addresses the user's prompt and requirements

criteria.5: Fully addresses all aspects of the prompt with comprehensive coverage
criteria.4: Addresses most aspects well with minor gaps
criteria.3: Covers the main points but may miss some details
criteria.2: Partially addresses the prompt with notable omissions
criteria.1: Minimally addresses the prompt with significant gaps
criteria.0: Fails to address the prompt or provides irrelevant content

commonIssues: Providing generic responses that don't match the specific request
Stopping mid-thought or providing incomplete answers

totalScore.description: Total score is the sum of clarity and completeness scores

structure: Specific improvement area (what could be better)

clarity: Consider requesting examples or specific details
Ask the model to organize information with headings or bullet points
Be more specific about the format you want
completeness: Break complex questions into smaller parts
Ask follow-up questions to cover all aspects
Request comprehensive coverage of the topic
Specify all the information you need upfront
both: Try providing more context in your prompt
Consider using prompt templates or frameworks
Ask the model to explain its reasoning
Request both an overview and detailed explanation

invalidResponse.notes: The model didn't provide a valid response. Try rephrasing your prompt or checking for technical issues.

partialResponse.notes: Response appears cut off due to length limits. Try asking for a more concise answer or break into multiple prompts.

offTopicResponse.notes: The response doesn't address your prompt. Try being more specific about what you want.
